column5: To all you men and women, regardless of borders, I say thank you for your sacrifice and to the service of your respective countries.   To those of whom we know, and those whom we do not, who gave the last full measure to their country, I drop my knee in honor and rememberance.  Blessed is he who lays down his life for another.  May God richly bless them all and grant them eternal peace.
Have a great and safe holiday. And an Amen from me also, Rich.
